dashboard.description: The app for easy management of members, finances, and club data – directly on your PC.

members.title: Member Management
members.description: Record, edit, and manage all club members including groups, roles, and SEPA data.

finance.title: Finance
finance.description: Keep track of membership fees, payment details, and SEPA direct debits.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure Open Clubmanager to suit your needs.

groups.title: Group Management
groups.description: Organize members into thematic or organizational groups, such as training units, project teams, or age categories. Groups help you filter, manage fees, and reflect internal club structures.

roles.title: Role Management
roles.description: Manage member roles and responsibilities – for example, as board members, coaches, or treasurers. Roles help define responsibilities and control visibility or permissions.

sections.title: Section Management
sections.description: Structure your club into departments such as soccer, gymnastics, or music. Departments help differentiate fees and organize activities more effectively.

table.description: Select a member from the list and click the edit icon to edit it.
